channel.title: Webclient connection problem
channel.description: I am running a 317 delta. I just uploaded my jar and cache to web. I wrote html to play jar on website (I can run jar from my computer with no problems). It downloads, loads and runs jar file, but does not download the cache (says searching for title screen, then goes connection failed retrying in 10, 9, 8...). How do I configure my client to automatically download and install cache and then to find it on my computer after that?

item.title: Webclient connection problem
item.dc:creator: @warlok warlok
item.description:
@warlok wrote:

Are you sure you compressed the Jar correctly for a webclient? When making the Jar, you are not supposed to include the cache/sprites folder.

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient connection problem
item.dc:creator: @low93bowtie low93bowtie
item.description:
@low93bowtie wrote:

I did. I tried a few different things and now got it to download cache and unzip in right place, but when I log in, I get this…

error.png766×505

I can run jar file from computer and it works fine…

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient connection problem
item.dc:creator: @warlok warlok
item.description:
@warlok wrote:

Did you follow all the steps (including updating of your client to download Cache) in this tutorial?
